content:
hello, this may be a bit of a noobie question, but I am running triagebot locally and cannot figure out how to enable debug! and info! calls in triagebot::lib and other modules. Only the calls in main.rs seem to be printing.

I’m wondering how I can enable the rest of the codebase to output such calls when running cargo run —bin triagebot. I have already set RUST_LOG=“debug” in env

cc @simulacrum
You may need to add a call to enable logging into the binary you're running
Are the quotes in env there literal?
